ygData.subject: Re: research item on lvl 16+
ygData.msgSnippet: At 24 it changes.  I con like this: Red - 3+ lvls above Yellow - 1-2 lvls above White/Black - Even Blue - Up to 7 lvls below Green - 8+ lvls below NOTE:  At 8
ygData.messageBody:
At 24 it changes. I con like this:

Red - 3+ lvls above
Yellow - 1-2 lvls above
White/Black - Even
Blue - Up to 7 lvls below
Green - 8+ lvls below

NOTE: At 8 lvls below, which is the highest green con the message says
something to the effect that "This creature could pose problems." Below
that it says "You could probably win this fight."

It appears that they assume that at this level and higher that the crits you
will be facing are considerably harder, which of course is true.

Ylandril Feanaro <Soulforge>
High Elf Wizard of the 7th Initiate
Mithaniel Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Vumar <roleplay@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 9:14 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] research item on lvl 16+


> From: "Vumar" <roleplay@...>
>
> That is incorrect.
> 4+ Levels lower green
> 1-3 level lower blue
> 1-2 Levels Higher is yellow.
> 3+ is red.
>
> 5+ levels higher resists all spells.
>
> This is true up till level 16. After that it may change I don't know since
I
> am not that high up.
>
